long_description: Protects your tent's floor from damage by rocks or roots, keeps the bottom clean for packing and adds an additional layer of protection from water. Constructed of heavy-duty polyethylene. Should be sized to fit a bit smaller than tent floor in order to prevent water from collecting under tent; trim to fit or fold under floor. Overall dimensions: 6'8'' x 8'2''.
short_description: Protects your tent's floor from damage by rocks or roots, keeps the bottom clean for packing and adds an additional layer of protection from water.
